backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with item storage, category types (including Tin), sorting/filtering, and CRUD queries plus add-item logic.
backend/migration.mo: Handles migration from older item/category types to the new model that includes the Tin category.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and tests related to adding Tin support and related UI updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all frontend files and their roles, including Tin support and related UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with OKLCH color variables for light/dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and bootstrapping the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI with tab navigation, Tin category support, search/sort toolbar, and add-item dialog wiring.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppHead: Top header with logo and collection title for the app.
frontend/src/components/collection/Colle: Search and sort toolbar component with optional book-specific sort options.
frontend/src/components/collection/Empty: Empty-state illustration and messaging when no collection items are present.
frontend/src/components/collection/ItemC: Item card displaying photo, category badge (including Tin), metadata, and details dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/collection/ItemD: Displays item details in a dialog, including category-specific info, image preview, timestamp, and metadata.
frontend/src/components/collection/ItemF: Form dialog for creating new items, handling category selection, field inputs, photo upload, and submission.
frontend/src/components/collection/ItemL: Renders a grid of item cards with loading skeletons and an empty state when no items exist.
frontend/src/components/collection/Photo: Allows users to upload an image, shows a preview, and converts the file into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCollectionMutation: Provides mutation for adding items to the collection and handles cache invalidation and toast notifications.
Fetches all items and category-specific filtered lists from the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCollectionViewStat: Manages search and sorting state and provides a function to filter and sort item lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login state, identity persistence, and authentication provider context.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines extensive OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes plus base body styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors and animations using OKLCH CSS variables and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements and existing features for a Girl Scout collection tracking app.
